info.title: KeyVaultClient
info.description: The key vault client performs cryptographic key operations and vault operations against the Key Vault service.

parameters.name: vaultBaseUrl
parameters.description: The vault name, for example https://myvault.vault.azure.net.

post.description: Creates a full backup using a user-provided SAS token to an Azure blob storage container.

parameters.name: azureStorageBlobContainerUri
parameters.description: Azure blob shared access signature token pointing to a valid Azure blob container where full backup needs to be stored. This token needs to be valid for at least next 24 hours from the time of making this call

Retry-After.description: The recommended number of seconds to wait before calling the URI specified in Azure-AsyncOperation.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: The URI to poll for completion status.

default.description: Key Vault error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Returns the status of full backup operation

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The id returned as part of the backup request

200.description: OK - Returns the full backup status

default.description: Key Vault error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Restores all key materials using the SAS token pointing to a previously stored Azure Blob storage backup folder

parameters.name: restoreBlobDetails
parameters.description: The Azure blob SAS token pointing to a folder where the previous successful full backup was stored

202.description: Started restore operation from the previously stored backup

Retry-After.description: The recommended number of seconds to wait before calling the URI specified in Azure-AsyncOperation.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: The URI to poll for completion status.

default.description: Key Vault error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Returns the status of full restore operation

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The Job Id returned part of the full restore operation

200.description: OK - Returns the full restore status

default.description: Key Vault error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Restores all key versions of a given key using user supplied SAS token pointing to a previously stored Azure Blob storage backup folder

parameters.name: keyName
parameters.description: The name of the key to be restored from the user supplied backup

parameters.name: restoreBlobDetails
parameters.description: The Azure blob SAS token pointing to a folder where the previous successful full backup was stored

202.description: Started selective key restore operation from the previously stored backup

Retry-After.description: The recommended number of seconds to wait before calling the URI specified in Azure-AsyncOperation.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: The URI to poll for completion status.

default.description: Key Vault error response describing why the operation failed.

folderToRestore.description: The Folder name of the blob where the previous successful full backup was stored

folder.description: The Folder name of the blob where the previous successful full backup was stored

statusDetails.description: The status details of restore operation.

error.description: Error encountered, if any, during the selective key restore operation.

jobId.description: Identifier for the selective key restore operation.

startTime.description: The start time of the restore operation

endTime.description: The end time of the restore operation
